title: Lie for Love
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Lie For Love par Sabrina Carpenter
I'm played out, it's late out
I'm really hoping and you don't care
This pent up, momentum
He's starting to become aware

I had the upper hand
But I don't, I don't
I know, I know, I don't
I had the upper hand
But I don't, I don't
I know, I know, I don't

We can't get too romantic
Too busy running high and low
I just don't understand it
Why I lie, why I lie for love

We can't get too romantic
Too busy running high and low
I just don't understand it
Why I lie, why I lie for love

It's all there, it's not fair
Where will our heads be when it's done?
When night falls, and you don't come
I'll stay up waiting for the sun

I had the upper hand
But I don't, I don't
I know, I know, I don't
I had the upper hand
But I don't, I don't
I know, I know, I don't

We can't get too romantic

Too busy running high and low
I just don't understand it
Why I lie, why I lie for love
We can't get too romantic
Too busy running high and low
I just don't understand it
Why I lie, why I lie for love

I had the upper hand but i,i,i
I had the upper hand but i
O-oh

We can't get too romantic
Too busy running high and low
I just don't understand it
Why I lie, why I lie for love
We can't get too romantic
Too busy running high and low

I just don't understand it
Why I lie, why I lie for love
